title: FireyFly/pixd: Colourful visualization tool for binary files
author: mpweiher
content: readme.md pixd is tool visualizing binary data using colour palette. is a lot ways akin a hexdump tool, except using coloured squares represent each octet.pixd uses 24-bit color sgr escape sequences. a list terminalemulators support these, xvilka's list supporting terminalemulators.screenshotlicensemit license. enjoy! alsohexd:more conventional hexdump tool colourful output, also pixd'scode is based .
